name: Slingshot Championship
description:
With a fingertip, shoot a ball to the primary target.
Have a fun with tons of object gimmicks like glass bottles, fruits, iron balls, cards.
Various stages(Supermarket, Factory, Rooftop and more) are prepared for you! Prove yourself as the best sharpshooter!

[Feature]
- With simplest one-touch control, you will experience the best FPS gaming experience!
- Best shooters should consider wind force for a higher score!
- Tons of supportive items will help your gameplay.
- Offline 2 player mode supported(playable without internet connection)
- Mutiplayer mode supported
- 16 languages supported
- Achievement & leaderboard supported
- Tablet devices supported
